query:
ALTER TABLE campaign_variants 
ADD COLUMN approvalStatus ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL AFTER status,
ADD COLUMN deploymentStatus ENUM('not_deployed', 'deployed', 'paused') DEFAULT 'not_deployed' NOT NULL AFTER approvalStatus,
ADD COLUMN deployedAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER deploymentStatus,
ADD COLUMN pausedAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER deployedAt;
